Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.WebForms.WebFormCodeDomSerializer, Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示一个 .ascx 文件（也称为用户控件），该文件是从托管 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的服务器请求。

span.span: Represents an .ascx file, also known as a user control, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

summary.span: 文件必须从 Web 窗体页进行调用，否则将出现分析程序错误。

span.span: The file must be called from a Web Forms page or a parser error will occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是与具有.ascx 扩展名的文件相关联。The class is associated with files that have .ascx extensions. 这些文件在运行时作为编译对象，并在服务器内存中缓存。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 您可以通过声明中另一个包括后者 Web 窗体页中的一个.ascx 文件嵌套用户控件。You can nest user controls by declaring one .ascx file in another including the latter in a Web Forms page. 用户控件包含在 ASP.NET Web 窗体页和 Web 开发人员提供了捕获常用的 Web UI 的简便方法。User controls are contained in ASP.NET Web Forms pages, and offer Web developers an easy way to capture commonly used Web UI. 实例化和缓存方面类似于对象。They are instantiated and cached in ways similar to objects. 与不同的页面，但是，用户控件不能单独调用。Unlike pages, however, user controls cannot be called independently. 它们仅可以从页面或其他包含它们的用户控件调用。They can only be called from the page or other user control that contains them. 如果你想要创建使用代码隐藏技术的用户控件，派生自此类。Derive from this class if you want to create a user control using the code-behind technique. 如果你要开发 Web 窗体页使用此技术，建议此操作。This is recommended if you are developing Web Forms pages using this technique. 有关以声明方式创建用户控件的信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 用户控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e601b3d-bb16-4dbe-9e35-7e92a34565ca)。For information about creating user controls declaratively, see [ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e601b3d-bb16-4dbe-9e35-7e92a34565ca). ## Examples 在以下示例中，定义的类`SimpleControl`，继承类，并可用作一种 ASP.NET 代码隐藏类。The class defined in the following example, `SimpleControl`, inherits the class and can be used as an ASP.NET code-behind class. 它使用， ，并Web 服务器控件，并定义`myButton_Click`方法来分配属性值，以及两个字符串，为属性。It uses the , , and Web server controls and defines a `myButton_Click` method that assigns the property value, along with two strings, to the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/CS/simplecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/VB/simplecontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例是.ascx 文件中包含的标记。The following example is markup contained in an .ascx file. 可以使用`SimpleControl`类定义上一示例中为此.ascx 文件中的标记的代码隐藏类。You can use the `SimpleControl` class defined in the previous example as a code-behind class for the markup in this .ascx file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/CS/simpleformcs.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Sys.Web.UI.TemplateControl_UserControl/VB/simpleformvb.ascx#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不应创建的实例类。You do not typically create an instance of the class. 若要创建你自己的用户控件，请从继承类。To create your own user control, inherit from the class. 若要以编程方式创建新的用户控件在 ASP.NET 页上，使用方法。To create a new user control on an ASP.NET page programmatically, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将两个键/值对添加到应用程序状态与用户控件关联，如果用户控件的属性返回`false`。The following example adds two key value pairs to the application state associated with a user control if the user control's property returns `false`. 该代码时满足此条件，则使用方法，通过用户控件的属性，若要添加的密钥，其值。When this condition is met, the code uses the method, through the user control's property, to add the keys and their values. summary.span: 获取与包含用户控件的应用程序关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the application that contains the user control.

value.span: 用来存储用户控件的数据的 对象。

span.span: The object in which to store the user control's data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可存储供以后检索的数据和应用程序之间共享。The allows you to store data for later retrieval, and is shared across the application. 存储的数据是独立于当前页或用户会话。The data that you store is independent of the current page or user session. 通过此属性来提高页面或应用程序的性能，如果创建的数据访问数据速度较慢。Access data through this property to boost page or application performance if creating the data is slow. 有关使用缓存的详细信息，请参阅[缓存应用程序数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。For more information about using the Cache, see [Caching Application Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d). ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来存储属性值为Web 服务器控件`txtValue`，在与用户控件的应用程序关联的对象。The following example uses the property to store the property value of a Web server control, `txtValue`, in the object associated with the user control's application. 它使用属性为此，请将该项分配的一个关键参数值`txtName.Text`。It uses the property to do so, assigning the item a key parameter value of `txtName.Text`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取对该用户控件的缓存参数集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of caching parameters for this user control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含为该 定义缓存参数的属性。

span.span: A containing properties that define the caching parameters for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的实例的缓存参数类。The property defines the cache parameters for the instance of the class. 属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性它将返回的对象。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 不能以声明方式设置属性。The property cannot be set declaratively. 它必须以编程方式设置。It must be set programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否可以缓存用户控件，以及如果是这样，设置为 10 秒缓存控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the user control can be cached, and if so, sets the property to cache the control for 10 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[UserControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControlCachePolicy/CS/usercontrolcachepolicycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[UserControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControlCachePolicy/VB/usercontrolcachepolicyvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法期间`Page_Init`请求处理阶段。The following example calls the method during the `Page_Init` stage of request processing. 在这种情况下初始化从页面本身，但您无法从另一个控件对其进行初始化，并通过作为此方法的参数包含页面中的属性值。In this case it is initialized from the page itself, but you could initialize it from another control and pass the property value of the containing page as the parameter for this method. summary.span: 从用 方法保存的上一个用户控件请求还原视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores the view-state information from a previous user control request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 您可以将视图状态值加载到一个字段，以便无需检索从属性更高版本。You can load a view-state value into a field so that you do not have to retrieve it from the property later. 此外可以插入到值属性之前调用，这是使在与服务器的往返行程中保持原样的字段的有效方法。You can also insert the value into the property just before calling , which is an effective way to make a field persist across round trips to the server. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何管理其视图状态使用的用户控件和方法。The following example demonstrates a user control that manages its view state using the and methods. [!code-csharp[UserControl_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/CS/usercontrol2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UserControl_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/VB/usercontrol2.vb#1)]

The physical path to the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然类似于方法，此方法将映射从.ascx 文件的位置，不是.aspx 文件的位置的路径。While similar to the method, this method maps the path from the .ascx file's location, not the .aspx file's location. 可以使用此方法以获取图像目录的路径，或与关联的其他资源在对象。You can use this method to obtain a path to a directory of images or other resources associated with your object. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法将关联起来`actualServerPath`与名为的用户控件关联的物理路径的变量`myControl`。The following example calls the method to associate an `actualServerPath` variable with the physical path associated with the user control named `myControl`. [!code-csharp[UserControl1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl1/CS/usercontrol1.cs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[UserControl1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl1/VB/usercontrol1.vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此方法时，收到通知时必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, the must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 此方法将确认与关联的站点信息实例，并确保为正确初始化类对象。This method confirms site information associated with the instance and ensures that the class is initialized correctly as a object. 在用户控件的生命周期的此阶段，控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the user control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，不能访问其他服务器控件时调用此方法，不管它是子级或到此控件的父级。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他服务器控件不能确定要创建并可供访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

summary.span: 保存自上次页回发以来发生的所有用户控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any user control view-state changes that have occurred since the last page postback.

returns.span: 返回用户控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the user control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与控件关联的视图状态，则返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, it returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情况下，不需要调用此方法。In general, you do not need to call this method. 但是，如果存储视图状态中的自定义信息，可以重写此方法以执行此操作。However, if you store custom information in view state, you can override this method to do so. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何管理其视图状态使用的用户控件和方法。The following example demonstrates a user control that manages its view state using the and methods. [!code-csharp[UserControl_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/CS/usercontrol2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UserControl_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl_StateManagement/VB/usercontrol2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是否与 ASP 页面兼容。The object is compatible with ASP pages. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性编写的 Web 服务器计算机在其运行的用户控件的名称。The following example uses the property to write the name of the Web server computer on which the user control is running. `myControl.Response.Write`语法指示要显示与该控件获取的信息的用户控件`myControl.Server.Machinename`语法。The `myControl.Response.Write` syntax instructs the user control to display the information the control obtains with the `myControl.Server.Machinename` syntax. [!code-csharp[UserControl1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl1/CS/usercontrol1.cs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[UserControl1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UserControl1/VB/usercontrol1.vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将值添加到用户控件的属性。The following example adds values to the property of a user control. `myControl.Session.Add`语法将两个值插入Web 服务器控件添加到用户控件和包含它的页面与关联的会话。The `myControl.Session.Add` syntax inserts the values of two Web server controls to the session associated with the user control and the page that contains it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪跟踪，并提供了有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 对于要在呈现的页面中显示的跟踪数据，必须启用该页面的跟踪。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing for that page. 默认情况下已禁用页跟踪。By default, page tracing is disabled. 若要启用页跟踪，请使用[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令，如下所示： \<%@ 页跟踪 ="true"的 %>To enable tracing for a page, use the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive as follows: \<%@ Page trace="true" %>
